snippet: A California school district will no longer take part in funeral processions for sailors and Navy SEALS killed overseas that have drawn thousands of students....

headline.main: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism
headline.print_headline: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism

lead_paragraph: A California school district will no longer take part in funeral processions for sailors and Navy SEALS killed overseas that have drawn thousands of students.
